description: The FSC Chain of Custody Standard tracks forest-based material and fiber through the supply chain to the end product.
labelUseRequirements: Labels must be approved by FSC and comply with FSC trademark requirements. Organizations must hold valid FSC chain of custody certificates.
volumeTrackingRequirements: Organizations must maintain accurate records of input and output volumes by FSC material category and implement proper volume accounting systems.
dueDiligenceRequirements: Organizations must implement controlled wood due diligence system (DDS) to ensure non-FSC inputs meet FSC controlled wood requirements.
